pkgmetadata.longdescription:
An API for dealing with PostgreSQL's binary data format.
It can be used to implement performant bindings to Postgres. E.g., <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/hasql "hasql"> is based on this library.
It supports all Postgres versions starting from 8.3 and is tested against 8.3, 9.3 and 9.5 with the @integer_datetimes@ setting off and on.
